name: Listened to Rest In Prayer, Bozo

content.html:
SHOW NOTES Please welcome the chainsaw brides of Christ Catholics: Be proud of all your hell lore! Fixing the Hallmark Movie Boyfriend Some media advice Let’s talk about Hugh Freeze’s recruiting history! What about his W-L record? How To Hire A Bama-Killing Coach Holding Auburn to Auburn’s own standards Let’s talk about some actual coaching hires! Hello, Wisconsin! Another coaching hire breaks mid-show!
